QuestData.Title: A Pilgrimage Gone Awry
QuestData.Description: I am a humble pilgrim, I swear. Please don't hurt me!$B$BMy sister and I were traveling to Auchindoun to pay our respects to my grandmother when we hit an overturned rock and lost control of our caravan. I managed to survive, but my sister...$B$B<Nadur cries.>$B$BPlease, you have to help me. I'm desperate. If you could bring me some prowler blood, snapdragon flowers, and a riverhopper eye, I can fashion a potion to bring her back. I just know it....
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather $1oa Prowler Blood, $2oa Snapdragon Fronds, and a Riverhopper Eye.
